scripts.build-simple: python3 ../keras_to_deeplearnjs/run.py simple/model.h5 simple/model.js && node_modules/.bin/browserify simple/demo.js -o simple/bundle.js
scripts.build-mnist: python3 ../keras_to_deeplearnjs/run.py mnist/mnist.h5 mnist/model.js && node_modules/.bin/browserify mnist/mnist.js -o mnist/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build-simple && npm run build-mnist
